title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements. Identify stakeholders and gather their input. Conduct research on cognitive biases and decision-making processes.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points. Define the technical stack, development approach, and consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects. Include sections for error handling, testing strategies, and a section on privacy considerations due to the sensitive nature of the data. Also, provide an outline of how the system will handle different types of cognitive biases and how it will be trained and updated over time.

title: Data Collection and Processing
description: Determine the data sources and methods for collecting decision-making data. Design data processing pipelines and storage solutions.

title: Cognitive Bias Detection
description: Develop algorithms and models for detecting various cognitive biases in decision-making processes based on the collected data.

title: Mitigation Strategies
description: Implement strategies and techniques to mitigate the detected cognitive biases, such as nudges, debiasing interventions, or decision support tools.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for the system, including dashboards, visualizations, and user interactions.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the various components of the system and perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and standards.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and monitoring systems.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials.
